This update introduces the following features and enhancements:

• Now you can connect to available AirPlay and Chromecast devices from inside IDAGIO by using the menu on the player
• We've changed the way albums and playlists appear in your coll

We just turned two!

In one year, we've gone from 10.260 recordings to 69.488, and are adding around 5.000 per week. We've improved our search, added a personalised mix that updates every week, and are working on many more exciting updates. Thank yo

Streaming, reinvented for classical music.

With this update, we open a new chapter. We are in the process of compiling one of the world’s largest classical catalogues. We are already proud to offer the best search in classical music.

Now optimised for iPad! Stream classical music. Effortlessly search, navigate, discover and explore - all on an interface which is tailored for both iPad and iPhone. BONUS: Our iPad version supports multi-tasking, letting you use IDAGIO side by side with

Now optimised for iPad! Stream classical music. Effortlessly search, navigate, discover and explore - all on an interface which is tailored for both iPad and iPhone. BONUS: Our iPad version supports multi-tasking, letting you use IDAGIO side by side with

You can now sign in with your Facebook account! Access CD-quality streaming in just seconds. We've also fixed a black screen bug that some users reported. If you're still experiencing this issue, please let us know via contact@idagio.com.

Create your own playlists! Add your favourite classical music tracks and recordings to create your perfect mix. Also with this update: Sonos! Listen through your Sonos device directly from within the IDAGIO app – giving you access to all of IDAGIO's rich
Bug fixes and improvements to provide you the ultimate classical music streaming experience.
Bug fixes and improvements to provide you the ultimate classical music streaming experience.
Bug fixes and improvements to provide you the ultimate classical music streaming experience.
With the new version you can view albums related to your favourite recording. Also: Bug fixes and improvements to provide you the ultimate classical music streaming experience.
We fixed a crash that would occur while using personal playlists.

* Fixed a crash in the filter dialogue
* Further personal playlist stability improvements

* ¡Hola! IDAGIO is now available in Spanish on iOS
* iOS 12 support
* Improvements and small bugfixes

* Gapless playback: Listen to any recording without gaps (lossless quality only)
* Further bug fixes and improvements to provide you the ultimate classical music experience.
* This is the last version to support iOS 9.

• Original or re-release? We now indicate when a recording is remastered.
• Bug fixes and improvements to provide you the ultimate classical music experience.
* Fixed a crash that occurred while opening the app
* Let our brand new recommendation system take over when you finish listening to a playlist, recording, or album. Lean back, and enjoy.

• Original or re-release? We now indicate when a recording is remastered.
• Bug fixes and improvements to provide you the ultimate classical music experience.

* Gapless playback: Listen to any recording without gaps (lossless quality only)
* Further bug fixes and improvements to provide you the ultimate classical music experience.
* This is the last version to support iOS 9.

* Bonjour! IDAGIO is available in French now!
* Get more flexibility with autoplay. Change autoplay preferences in settings.
* Plus we worked on bug fixes and improvements to provide you the ultimate classical music experience.

* A new look for our mood player
* Bug fixes and improvements to provide you the ultimate classical music experience

* Composer Radio on profile pages
* Improved seeking experience in lossless mode

* New shuffle function for composer radio
* Bug fixes to improve playback and login experience

* Sorting by relevance for Albums
* Bug fix for our albums page
* Fixed long titles on ‘Discover’ from being cut off
* Fixed a buffering issue on lossless

* Improved action menu dropdown
* Bug fix for collection download after device is restored

* Expandable search categories to improve search usability
* Design improvements in the maxiplayer
* Improved metadata experience for multiple composer and contributors
* Shuffle and repeat functionality added
* Urgent bug fix

* Bug fixes for issues affecting the playback experience for some users.
* This is the last iOS 10 supporting release.

We polished the app and squished bugs that might have been affecting some users:
* wrong error message when searching in some cases
* a disappearing player in the app after relaunch and when listening via Sonos
* overall technical improvements

We're constantly working on improving IDAGIO. Completing this update will:
* Allow you to sign in using your Apple ID
* Improve your recent search history by listing your last 10 searches
We're also proud to be launching the Apple Watch app with

* We fixed the image flickering that appeared when locking the screen
* Other tiny bugs squished

IDAGIO now offers free access to the biggest and best collection of classical music, without the need to subscribe. As an IDAGIO Free user, you will be able to browse the entire catalog using the smart search function, listen to expert-curated playlists a

* Fixed a crash when starting playback on iOS 12
* Fixed a crash on startup
* Fixed a bug affecting back swipe

* Fixed a bug causing playback issues while offline and on lossless quality
* Bug fixes related to streaming on Apple TV, Sonos and Chromecast
* Bug fix related to Shuffle/Repeat buttons when connected to Sonos or Chromecast
* Fixed a bug causing

* Crash fixes related to connecting with Apple TV and re-connecting with Sonos
* Crash fix related to filtering
* Crash fixes related to starting the app and skipping tracks
* Fixed a bug causing playback to break on the Apple Watch app
* Bug fixes and improvements
* Gapless Playback is now available on all audio qualities!
* Fixed a crash that affected some users when playing downloaded lossless content.
* Chromecast bug fixes and improvements
* Bug fixes and improvements

* Exciting news: CarPlay is here! Just connect your device and enjoy IDAGIO while in your car
* More exciting news: We've opened Collection to everyone! IDAGIO Free users are now able to tap the heart icon and save their favorite tracks, recordings, al
* Bug fixes and improvements

* Album booklets have arrived! Enjoy finding out more about the album you're listening to with the digitized version of the CD booklet
* CarPlay improvements
* Bug fix related to playing downloaded content on Chromecast and Sonos
* Content select

* IDAGIO Live is now available on iOS! Join us for daily live talks, music and interviews from your favourite artists. On Discover, simply tap on the IDAGIO Live option in the top banner
* Bug fix related to soloist content
* Bug fixes and improvements

* Find more of what you're interested in by diving into categories on Discover with the new "View All" option
* Interested in helping us improve the IDAGIO app? We've just added an option in Settings, tap on it to let us know!
* For users with a fre

* IDAGIO is now available in Japan!
* Global Concert Hall is here: a new online concert venue where you can watch exclusive classical concerts live. On Discover, tap on the banner at the top to find out more
* Introduced new filtering options for Op

* You can now access all Global Concert Hall concerts directly from Discover!
* Composer Profiles now host an About tab
* You can now share more than one item in the app
* Bug fixes and improvements
* Bug fix: A bug was introduced with our latest update, causing the same albums to be listed under all artist profiles. This has now been fixed

* You can now access concerts in the main navigation menu
* Artist profiles now include information about live concerts
* Inline search for Works
* Bug fix: recordings were not shown in play history
* Bug fix: filters were not working on certa
* Fixes a crash during playback for Free users

* Bug fix: crashes during radio playback for free users
* Bug fix: connectivity issues with remote playback services
* Bug fix: mood player display fixes
* Bug fix: crashes when using CarPlayer services
* Bug fix: about tab was not displayed f

* Resolved an issue that caused the app to crash when playing via Sonos
* Fixed a crash when accessing Collection
* Resolved an issue that caused playback interruptions when connected to an external streaming device
* Bug fixes and improvements

* Enjoy the complete IDAGIO package with Premium+ Concerts: Streaming and offline listening in CD-quality, as well as access to every concert in the Global Concert Hall
* Introducing multi-month subscriptions: Save 44% with a 12-month Premium+ Concerts
* Bug fixes and improvements

* Fixed the problem of missing filters for periods and genres
* Other bug fixes and improvements
* Bug fixes and improvements
